StringTable.String: A formal alliance is a curious idea. Tying our fortunes to that of an alien business seems an unusually risky move. But in a galaxy filled with high-risk security threats, solidifying our relations with a friend may have some value.

StringTable.Label: IridiumAllianceFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Military Partnership

StringTable.Label: IridiumAllianceFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: A formal military alliance will provide our security forces valuable additional support in times of crisis. However we also risk being pulled into conflicts that will have little benefit to our business.

StringTable.Label: IridiumAllianceFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Partnership

StringTable.Label: IridiumAllianceFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Increasing the scope of our information sharing programs with our allies should lead to dramatic research gains on both sides. So long as we're not giving away any competitive advantage, the benefits of this should be obvious.

StringTable.Label: IridiumAllianceFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Partnership

StringTable.Label: IridiumAllianceFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The free movement of people and ideas across borders with our ally will ensure their markets remain open to us, and provide a tremendous opportunity to influence their thinking.

StringTable.Label: IridiumEminenceTech_Name
StringTable.String: Prominence

StringTable.Label: IridiumEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of the art of the deal is so respected that many parties now seek us out to help solve their problems for them. Our voices carry now, and our business profits from it.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMajestyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Superiority

StringTable.Label: IridiumMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The superiority of the Iridium market-based way of life is so obvious that many cultures now pre-emptively approach and beg us to acquire their assets on exceedingly generous terms.

StringTable.Label: IridiumUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_Dec
StringTable.String: United Planets sessions are remarkably crude, filled with beings who have little understanding of the subtleties of negotiations. Our diplomats take advantage of their simplicity with incredible ease.

StringTable.Label: IridiumUnitedPlanetsClout_Dec
StringTable.String: Convincing our allies to vote with us on U.P. measures wasn't difficult. The mutually beneficial effects of our long term growth plans are obvious, even to them.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Marketing

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Iridium Store.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our storefronts and marketplaces are more than just a place to earn a profit, although they certainly do that. They also serve as the public face of our company, the truest representation of what we are, and help spread our influence in the marketplace.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Brand Awareness

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Store Influence.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Marketing efforts which focus on the quality of our products will help increase the acceptance of our brand, ensuring that our base of potential customers continues to grow.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Brand Quality

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Store Profits.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: With the right marketing push we can ensure our consumers believe Iridium products are the highest quality, and worthy of the premium prices we'll soon start charging.

StringTable.Label: IridiumStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: The benefits of the Iridium marketplace are plain to see, and our traders are admired wherever they go. If we can make the process of emigration easier, Iridium influence should spread faster throughout the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: New arrivals to our culture often cling to backwards expectations about public services and facilities. Quickly assimilating them to the Iridium way of life should help ease this transition, and make our culture more influential.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: The superiority of a culture forged in an open marketplace of ideas was utterly predictable. Sentient life throughout the galaxy now has little choice but seeing the advantages of our way of life.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Growth can never stop, and the boundary between realities are nothing before that simple fact. Our product managers are already drawing up plans for a literally new dimension of products.

StringTable.Label: IridiumXenoCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Customer Relations

StringTable.Label: IridiumXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: To enable the Iridium Corporation, its network of suppliers, and all of our customers to take advantage of the new economy opening up for them, we'll need to build some dedicated and specialized trading facilities.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCommerceSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Customer Approval

StringTable.Label: IridiumCommerceSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A happy and content customer base serves as the foundation of our entire way of life. Notably, happy customers are almost always willing to buy next year's model.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCommerceSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Customer Fulfillment

StringTable.Label: IridiumCommerceSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Increasing our trading activities will ensure our goods are sold to the customers who need them most. And, not coincidentally, the customers who are willing to pay the most for them.

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Commerce

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Iridium Center Improvement

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of retail hub will be needed to showcase our latest products and services in the best possible light. Iridium Centers will increase the economic output of every world they're constructed on.

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarBanking_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Finance

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Investment Centers

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Improving the access our workers have to retail investment guidance centers will ensure capital doesn't just sit around, and is instead quickly reinvested in the places where it can grow fastest.

StringTable.Label: IridiumEconomicFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: If our external trading activities are unusually profitable, it's only rational to ramp those up, whether by increasing the volume of goods traded, or transitioning our product mix to include higher-margin commodities.

StringTable.Label: IridiumEconomicFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we want to reassign some of our shrewdest negotiators to our external treaties division, we can expect to see a little more income from those.

StringTable.Label: IridiumEconomicFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Tourism is an incredibly attractive business, bringing in external revenue to our economy. If we have the infrastructure to handle it, encouraging more tourists to travel here is practically printing free money.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Marketing Masters

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of The Iridium World Improvement

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Throughout the galaxy, sentient life talks of the marvels present in an Iridium World complex. Providing the ultimate consumption experience, Iridium Worlds boost the economy of their host worlds like few other structures.

StringTable.Label: IridiumFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated financial sectors, with the rapid data and transport links modern business requires, should provide our brightest financial and management minds all the tools they need to do the best work possible.

StringTable.Label: IridiumGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: It's taken some doing to convince the rest of the galaxy the benefit of allowing shares of their own businesses to be traded on Iridium exchanges. But now that we have, the benefit these exchanges will have to our own economy will be substantial.

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: When the supply of a good is limited, such as when it comes from a great distance, prices for that good become distorted. Increasing our trading activity will help minimize those distortions, leading to a more perfect market.

StringTable.Label: IridiumGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Permanent trading hubs will encourage more private traders to base their activities in places beneficial to us. Due to network effects, their work will help boost the profitability of our own trading, and vice versa.

StringTable.Label: IridiumGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved material handling equipment and just-in-time logistical capacity will be needed to maximize our trading revenue, and that will require new facilities to do it in.

StringTable.Label: IridiumTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: The Iridium Corporation is seen throughout the market as the best and most honest dealer in the galaxy. Our bazaars are more than just markets; they're living, breathing proof of the superiority of our way of life.

StringTable.Label: IridiumXenoEntertainment_Dec
StringTable.String: We mustn't allow our workers to become cynical or dissatisfied with their careers. The impact to our culture could sap productivity for years. Installing facilities to keep them entertained is really just a first step.

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Considering the population of the galaxy, the tourism industry represents an enormous untapped potential. Improved facilities to attract and entertain off-world facilities should help us begin extracting some of this wealth on offer.

StringTable.Label: IridiumPopulationDiversion_Dec
StringTable.String: Iridium workers love consuming the next big thing, and our market research has shown our existing entertainment complexes need to be updated. Bigger and better amusements should go a long way to keeping morale and productivity up.

StringTable.Label: IridiumIndustrialSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting our industrial processes to off-world environments has proven more challenging than expected. But with a commitment to quality management and continual improvement, things will get better, sooner than we might realize.

StringTable.Label: IridiumConstructionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our quality managers have had great success adapting their methodologies to off-world manufacturing environments, and have begun to identify opportunities for improvement in our construction sector.

StringTable.Label: IridiumManufacturingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: However refined they might seem, there's always room for improving our manufacturing techniques. Even the most minor efficiency gains are worthy of getting excited over.

StringTable.Label: IridiumIndustrialMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our manufacturing sector is now almost perfectly efficient, even our finest managers struggling to find room for improvement. Not that they've given up of course. A few small refinements surely remain to be found.

StringTable.Label: IridiumResearchOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We always have to keep a firm hand on R & D, to ensure that our brlliant but absent-minded researchers not only stay on track and meet their research goals, but keep costs down while they're doing so.

StringTable.Label: IridiumTechnologicalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Specializing our research efforts should always be done cautiously, as it can be tough to predict what our business will require in the future. We should ensure that any specialization we pursue doesn't impede our research ability in other fields.

StringTable.Label: IridiumPlanetarySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our colonization managers have done excellent work over the past few years, and are beginning to refine some of their initial processes, allowing us to improve specific aspects of our colonies.

StringTable.Label: IridiumAgriculturalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Offloading much of our farming work to external service providers will ensure our workers are fed as efficiently as possible.

StringTable.Label: IridiumFarmingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Something about working with dirt all the time seems to cause a person to become complacent and set in their ways. We have to continuously press our food suppliers to keep on top of their continual improvement goals.

StringTable.Label: IridiumAgriculturalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our suppliers have almost mastered agricultural technology, Iridium farms having won many trade awards throughout the galaxy for their efficiency. But that's no reason to rest; even the best can be improved upon.

StringTable.Label: IridiumColonizationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The biggest problem with our colonies on extreme worlds, other than the horrible quality of life, is of course, the low production potential. If we can dedicate R & D resources to improve production on these planets, we might just make more of them worthwhile.

StringTable.Label: IridiumBiospherePerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our outposts on toxic and radioactive worlds are still shockingly limited in terms of production capacity. We should do everything we can to correct that.

StringTable.Label: IridiumInterstellarSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: A targeted design review of a chosen system should be able to come up with some improvements that management had previously missed.

StringTable.Label: IridiumIonOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Regular teleconferences between our engine managers have allowed them to share tips and maintenance tricks, revealing a number of improvements we could possibly implement on our Ion Drive systems across the entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: IridiumWarpFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our initial implementation of Warp Engines apparently left much room for improvement. R & D believes that a number of different efficiencies have yet to be found in these systems.

StringTable.Label: IridiumHyperwarpMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Iridium R & D leads the galaxy in its work on drive technologies, giving us an incredible competitive advantage in all our dealings. And thanks to the right worker incentives, they still look tirelessly for more ways to improve upon our edge.

StringTable.Label: IridiumSensorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: It seems probable that our network of suppliers can help improve our sensor systems. With the right aftermarket upgrades and accessories, our sensor systems could be made more effective, or at the very least more efficient.

StringTable.Label: IridiumEnergyFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Sensor managers can earn bonuses for identifying ways to do their work more effectively, and a number of great ideas have percolated up the chain of command recently due to this practice.

StringTable.Label: IridiumSensorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: R & D seem pretty sure that we're not going to find any more increases in our sensor range, due to some inescapable constraints of this universe. But there's no reason we can't still try to make them lighter or cheaper.

StringTable.Label: IridiumPrecursorRelicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor relics don't just offer us scraps of technology; they can also impart significant cultural and economic effects. If we so choose, we can adapt our Precursor research efforts to maximize these associated effects.

StringTable.Label: IridiumLifeSupportOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are a variety of ways our product managers can improve upon our life support systems. They can make these systems lighter, more effective, or simply more cost effective.

StringTable.Label: IridiumSupportFieldFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The contractor who delivered our field-based life support systems has been fired, due to the many messes those early systems left behind. Internal R & D is looking for ways to improve these systems now.

StringTable.Label: IridiumLifeSupportMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our direct-nutrient injection technology leads the galactic life support market, all of our competitors feverishly trying to build their own versions. But even with the lead, that's no reason to stop improving on our part.

StringTable.Label: IridiumOrbitalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: While gathered for one of their regular conferences, our orbital construction managers came up with a number of methods with which we could begin improving our orbital construction practices.

StringTable.Label: IridiumZeroGravityOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our contract managers have been monitoring the performance of our construction contractors, and identified a number of lapses in their performance. The appropriate clauses forcing them to improve have been triggered.

StringTable.Label: IridiumOrbitalConstructionFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: After a slightly bumpy transition period, our new construction contractors are settling in, and are already finding ways to improve upon their work.

StringTable.Label: IridiumHullMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our contractors claim that they've mastered ship construction. But further improvements are always possible; our entire quality management apparatus rests on that fact.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCarrierFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Feedback from users of our early carrier modules have revealed a number of avenues of improvement we can begin pursuing.

StringTable.Label: IridiumLogisticalOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A new version of our quality management process is being installed throughout our corporation and sub-contractors. The first areas to likely see improvements are our core logistical operations.

StringTable.Label: IridiumWeaponsSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Instructing our R & D department to specialize their weapons research will eventually lead to more breakthroughs for our chosen class of weapon, and in the short term, more efficient weapons.

StringTable.Label: IridiumBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Many of our sub-contractors are making great strides in the development of materials used in beam weapons. These new materials could lead to a number of new improvements for our arsenal.

StringTable.Label: IridiumHighEnergyFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A review of our beam weapon systems has revealed a number of non-ideal decisions were made during their design. No-one is apparently to blame for this, though many will be fired for it. In the meantime, R & D has begun work to improve these weapons.

StringTable.Label: IridiumBeamWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The Iridium marketplace has few peers in the field of beam weaponry, our weapons as powerful as any in the galaxy. But a few small efficiencies remain to be gained from our current generation.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: It shouldn't take much effort for R & D to find ways to improve upon our missile systems, seeing as how fundamentally simple the technology is.

StringTable.Label: IridiumWarheadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Warhead development is a specialized industry with very few qualified suppliers, resulting in a variety of market inefficiencies. It will take some concentrated effort to force our suppliers to do better.

StringTable.Label: IridiumPayloadMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Our supplier for Photonic warhead systems has several performance incentives built into their contract to deliver improved systems within agreed timeframes which are rapidly approaching.

StringTable.Label: IridiumKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: A vast number of components are needed for our kinetic weapons. It's only a matter of time before our suppliers come up with improved versions of those components, leading to improved weapons for us.

StringTable.Label: IridiumKineticAccelerationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A recent breakthrough in the superconductor sector promises to lead to a number of improvements for our kinetic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: IridiumKineticMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: The Iridium Corporation and her associated suppliers are now widely regarded as masters of kinetic weapon technology, with few peers in the galaxy. Only a few remaining efficiencies remain to be found in the field.

StringTable.Label: IridiumAcquisitionSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Acquisition Specialization

StringTable.Label: IridiumAcquisitionSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our military systems.

StringTable.Label: IridiumAcquisitionSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our security forces will have a much easier time acquiring other assets if the tools they use to do so are the best they can be.

StringTable.Label: IridiumInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Certain planetary acquisitions may prove more challenging than others, and in those cases, we should be sure our security forces have the advanced tactics and equipment they need to do their jobs.

StringTable.Label: IridiumGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our recent mastery over the graviton will allow our security forces increased flexibility when dealing with particularly recalcitrant counterparties during the initial stages of the acquisition process.

StringTable.Label: IridiumDefensiveSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: It shouldn't take much work to improve the capabilities of our defensive systems. The first generation of any technology always has room for substantial improvement.

StringTable.Label: IridiumShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our shield supply contract has several performance incentive clauses in it to coax our supplier to improve upon their shield systems. We expect to see the fruits of those any day now.

StringTable.Label: IridiumBarrierSystemFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: A competitor to our current shield system supplier promises the ability to deliver improved shields if we can award the contract to them. Breaking the existing contract may incur penalties, but sometimes that's the cost of progress.

StringTable.Label: IridiumShieldMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: It shouldn't come as a surprise that we've mastered shielding technology so completely, given the advantages our commitment to open and competitive markets provides. And that process doesn't end; more improvements are surely to come.

StringTable.Label: IridiumPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: In between major generations of systems, our suppliers often come up with minor updates to their equipment which feature minor performance gains. We have no reason to suspect our point defense systems will be any different.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCounterMeasureFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: We ensured that upgrade protocols were included in our ECM suite contract, as we do with all new technologies. And our vendor has already hinted at a number of promising possibilites the next round of updates might hold.

StringTable.Label: IridiumDroneSystemMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone systems added so much extra equipment to our point defenses, that any minor cost or weight savings we can find with them will be magnified significantly.

StringTable.Label: IridiumArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor is so simple that we have a pretty broad selection of suppliers willing to manufacture it for us, all of whom promise to improve upon what we already have.

StringTable.Label: IridiumArmorFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: No system is ever perfect, and our armor manufacturers know they have to relentlessly pursue innovations if they want to retain the market share they have.

StringTable.Label: IridiumArmorMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Iridium security vessels are already some of the most durable in the galaxy. But the high-risk threats they're called to face are always increasing their own risk profiles. We must continuously innovate our armor systems to stay ahead of the curve.

StringTable.Label: IridiumDiplomaticSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful study of the languages used by our neighbors may unlock valuable insights into the way they think. This will make our diplomatic efforts easier, to say nothing of the boon it will cause for our advertising industry.

StringTable.Label: IridiumPoliticalSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: There are several competing philosophies for how corporate governance should be conducted in a galaxy-spanning business. We should choose among these options very carefully.

StringTable.Label: IridiumPoliticalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Even our core management policies must subject themselves to a process of continuous improvement. A number of new management philosophies have been developed in recent years which we would be wise to consider carefully.

StringTable.Label: IridiumPoliticalMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of the most advanced management techniques will require total buy-in from our employees. It's taken the deployment of a new generation of subconscious motivational brain wave for us to even consider some of these techniques.

StringTable.Label: IridiumDiplomaticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Contract Negotiation

StringTable.Label: IridiumDiplomaticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Depending on our business needs, we may wish to pursue specific types of diplomatic treaties with our friendliest competitors.

StringTable.Label: IridiumAllianceFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Partnerships

StringTable.Label: IridiumAllianceFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our negotiators are without peer in this galaxy, and can slant alliances in any direction they choose. We should consider our business needs carefully before entering such talks.

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Marketing Specialization

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Marketing Potential

StringTable.Label: IridiumMarketingSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Marketing is one of the most important aspects of our business. The potential to increase profits or improve our corporate image is immense, and any resources spent here are assuredly ones spent wisely.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCommerceSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Routine market research has shown that our customers have a variety of unique needs that our quickly growing economy could fulfill for them. Targeting some of these needs specifically might be warranted.

StringTable.Label: IridiumEconomicFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Iridium Corporation is involved in multiple lines of business, ensuring a nice healthy mix of revenue sources. But when business conditions dictate it, we can also choose to specialize in a specific field, to try and maximize the income we receive there.

StringTable.Label: IridiumTradeOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Understanding what the customer needs is key in any business, and external trading is no different. If we focus our trading on specific types of customers, we should be able to profit more handsomely from our efforts.

StringTable.Label: IridiumTradeFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: All of our business activities should complement each other, and if our trading department can help boost specific sectors of our business, we'd be foolish not to pursue it.

StringTable.Label: IridiumApprovalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Market research has identified a number of audiences within our business that might be more receptive to certain types of enterainment products.
